title: Sampler
medium:
Medium: silk embroidery on wool foundation
Technique: embroidered in cross, stem, eyelet, satin, and running stitches on plain weave foundation
description: Within a curving octagonal frame, four alphabets, text: "How should the morning of my days/ be spent in humble pray'r and praise,/ to him who gave me life and breath,/ and still preserves my soul from death/ To him I'll dedicate my days,/ Then shall I prosper in my ways;/ And whilst my calling I pursue/ His praise shall terminate my view."  Then four squares of pattern darning and a rose and signature.
name: Sampler
